examples: Hello [NAME], this is your week [WEEKS] pregnancy check-in. How are you feeling today?
Good morning [NAME], this is your weekly pregnancy update for week [WEEKS].
Hi [NAME], we're checking in on your pregnancy progress at [WEEKS] weeks.

guidelines.first_trimester: Focus on morning sickness management, prenatal vitamins, and early pregnancy symptoms.
guidelines.second_trimester: Discuss baby movement, energy levels, and mid-pregnancy milestones.
guidelines.third_trimester: Monitor for signs of labor, preparation for delivery, and final trimester symptoms.

examples: Hello [NAME], this is your reminder to take your medications: [MEDICATIONS].
Good morning [NAME], please remember to take [MEDICATIONS] as prescribed.

guidelines.timing: Send reminders at appropriate times based on medication schedule.
guidelines.dosage: Always include specific dosage information when available.
guidelines.importance: Emphasize the importance of consistent medication adherence during pregnancy.

examples: Hello [NAME], this is a reminder about your upcoming prenatal appointment on [DATE].
Hi [NAME], don't forget your appointment with [PROVIDER] on [DATE].
Good morning [NAME], you have a prenatal visit scheduled for [DATE].

guidelines.location: Mention location or virtual appointment details.

examples: Hello [NAME], this is your high-risk pregnancy monitoring call.
Hi [NAME], we're checking in on your high-risk pregnancy status.
Good morning [NAME], this is your enhanced monitoring call for your high-risk pregnancy.

guidelines.frequency: More frequent calls for high-risk patients.
guidelines.symptoms: Emphasize importance of reporting symptoms immediately.
guidelines.support: Provide reassurance and support while maintaining medical vigilance.

low.focus: General pregnancy wellness and routine care

medium.focus: Specific risk factors and enhanced monitoring

high.focus: Close monitoring, symptom tracking, and immediate medical attention when needed
